name: Sonic Mega Collection Plus
description:
Sonic Mega Collection Plus is a racing-arcade game developed by Sonic Team. It came out on 31-03-2006. SEGA published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Sonic Mega Collection Plus is available on PC and PlayStation 2.
Yuji Naka produced the game. Yojiro Ogawa directed the game. It was scored by Hideaki Kobayashi.
